channel.title: How to make it so staff dosent loose items
channel.description: hi i have a ring on whe im pking bcuz ima pure i use it so i have a equal str bonus with the high lvls and if i die they loot and get the powersul ring. how do i make it so staff dosent loose items/the ring. Thanks so much ~Mag

item.title: How to make it so staff dosent loose items
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Search for,

if (!IsInFightCave()

In client.java and keep following what he posted above.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make it so staff dosent loose items
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

search something like this

if (!IsInFightCave()

you should see something like this

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

if you want it for mods try this

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 1 && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

Read full topic
